banner.title: Now available in Catalonia and the Balearic Islands.

step1.title: Explore and discover
step1.description: Browse our catalog of verified properties. Filter by location, price, type and features to find exactly what you're looking for.

step2.title: Contact the owner
step2.description: Once you find a property you're interested in, contact the owner directly. Get your questions answered and schedule a visit.

step3.title: Close the deal with confidence
step3.description: With our team's support, complete the transaction securely. Verified documentation and satisfaction guarantee.

q1.question: How can I list my property?
q1.answer: Sign up on the platform, verify your account and then you can list your property in just a few minutes. Add photos, description and price. Our team will review the listing to ensure quality.

q2.question: What are the platform costs?
q2.answer: Exploring properties is completely free. For owners, we offer different plans according to their needs. The basic plan is free and premium plans offer more visibility and features.

q3.question: How is owner identity verified?
q3.answer: All owners must verify their identity through a secure process that includes document verification and phone number verification. This ensures the safety of all users.

q4.question: Can I rent and sell at the same time?
q4.answer: Yes, you can indicate if your property is available for rent, sale or both options. This way you reach a wider interested audience.

q5.question: How does contacting owners work?
q5.answer: Once you find an interesting property, you can send a message directly to the owner through the platform. You'll receive notifications when they respond.

footer.tagline: The trusted platform to find your next home.
